bomberman.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class to represent the server. This server is used to interact and respond to clients by sending commands according to received messages. Establishes connection between client and database. It runs on a thread.
    Author:
    andre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(int port)
      Creates server.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatStart()
      Method to start chat.
      void closeConnection()
      Close server.
      void handleClients()
      Method to handle clients and create a thread for each one of them, so the server can handle received infor from each client.
      void receiving(java.net.Socket client, DatabaseConnection database)
      Method to check received info from clients.
      void run()
      Method that keeps handling clients when the server is running.
      void send(java.lang.String toSend, java.net.Socket client)
      Method to send String to a client.
      void sendToAll(java.lang.String toSend)
      Send String to all gamers.
      void setGamerRunning(boolean gameRunning)

        public Server(int port)
        Creates server.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method that keeps handling clients when the server is running.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • handleClients

        public void handleClients()
        Method to handle clients and create a thread for each one of them, so the server can handle received infor from each client.

      • receiving

        public void receiving(java.net.Socket client,
                      DatabaseConnection database)
        Method to check received info from clients. According to the received info, the server responds with a predifined command.
        Parameters:
        client - Client to check received info.
        database - The corresponding database connection.

      • chatStart

        public void chatStart()
        Method to start chat.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String toSend,
                 java.net.Socket client)
        Method to send String to a client.
        Parameters:
        toSend - String to send.
        client - Client to send String.

      • sendToAll

        public void sendToAll(java.lang.String toSend)
        Send String to all gamers. THis method is used in multiplayer mode for broadcasting.
        Parameters:
        toSend - String to send.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Close server.

      • setGamerRunning

        public void setGamerRunning(boolean gameRunning)
        Start game.
        Parameters:
        gameRunning - start game.
